Assign seasons to months

Assign seasons to months

season(month, hemisphere = c("south", "north"), lang = c("es", "en"))

Arguments

month

A numeric vector of months or a vector of dates.
hemisphere

A character with the hemisphere for wich to assign the seaons.
lang

Language to use.

Value

A factor vector of the same length as month with the season of each month.

Examples

season(1, lang = "en", h = "n")
#> [1] Winter
#> Levels: Summer Autumn Winter Spring
season(1, lang = "en")
#> [1] Summer
#> Levels: Summer Autumn Winter Spring
season(as.Date("2017-01-01"))
#> [1] Verano
#> Levels: Verano Otoño Invierno Primavera

Contents

  • Value
